name: Ghost Supply Fly
description: Ghost Supply Fly is a unique endless retro game! How to Play: Touch anywhere on the screen to display the power indicator, aim, set power, and release to make Left Ghost fly to the highest of heights. In-game soundtrack by Otha Syde,Slim Guerrilla & Dead Hippie. Grab coins to gain new landing platforms and 8 Different Ghost Supply Costumes! Compete with the world with GameCenter Leaderboard, Challenge Friends & Collect all the Game Center Achievements.
